price: Suka ce: "Tsarki ya tabbata a gare Ka! Bãbu sani a gare mu, lalle ne Kai, Kai ne Masani, Mai hikima."
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ لَا عِلۡمَ لَنَآ إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمۡتَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka lā ʿil'ma lanā illā mā ʿallamtanā innaka anta al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
